Text: Thanks Tvteam for the quick upload, they have a good history im sure its good quality you can probably safely bet your first born but at any rate when im finished will comment on a/v quality,  PLEASE SEED WHEN FINISHED EVERYONE. Ok, well thanks for uploading it... but its in a stupid format. It's a bloody .avc1 or something, now i have to convert it to AVI to watch it on DVD.

Thanks... but come on, use a better format

Thanks for the up TvTeam!

@grahto: avc1 isn't a "stupid" format, it's another name for H.264 - ya know... the STANDARD format that people have been releasing HD content in for quite some time... How about you think (and maybe do a couple google searches) before posting next time, hua?
